div.pre: 1379 Amastris, Paphlagonia, before 1925 (42) Burial: c. 85 B.C. (Pfeiler) Contents: 386 ? AE Amisus: 338 Cabeira: 1 Chabacta: 5 Comana: 5 Amastris: 8 Sinope: 11 Disposition: Istanbul This and the following hds. (nos. 1380-2, 1385-93 below) all consist of the Pontic emissions of Mithradates VI. The dating rests on the fact that two large issues of Amisus (Zeus/eagle and Dionysus/cista mystica) are missing. On the number of coins see no. 1380 below
